name: Isolata - Chapter 0 (Prototype)
description:
It's not safe out there.

Minimum Tested Requirements: OS: Windows 7 CPU: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200 RAM: 2 GB VGA: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX580

Software used: Godot Engine, Blender, FL Studio.

Isolata is our debut game, it's a short 3D Puzzle game with a light Horror theme.

Everything you see (and hear!), except some of the environmental textures, is completely made by us!

After releasing the game in 2022, we decided to put it back to Prototype Stage.
The idea is to keep working on it to improve game mechanics and add content.

If you wish to give your suggestions and feedback, or you need technical assistance, please visit the Community Board!
